pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 29, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 29, 2017:

Winnipeg, Manitoba

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will highlight Budget 2017 investments in child care. A media availability will follow.

South Y
5 Fermor Avenue
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.
  • Open coverage for visit of child care centre and media availability

Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Saskatchewan Polytechnic.

1130 Idylwyld Drive North
Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

Notes for media:

  •  Media must arrive no later than 1:15 p.m. via the main entrance
  • Open coverage for visit

Media appearances

An interview with the Prime Minister will be live streamed on the CBC Saskatoon Facebook page at 3:10 PM and air on CBC Radio One Saskatoon “Afternoon Edition” at 4:30 PM.

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Global Saskatoon News at 6 at 6:00 PM.

Note: all times local
